Description:
Look for non-system accounts SMB accessing a file with write (0x2) access mask via administrative share (i.e C$).

Author: Jose Rodriguez (@Cyb3rPandaH), OTR (Open Threat Research)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: SMB Create Remote File Admin Share
Query: sourcetype='windows-security' eql select * from _source_ where ((eventid = '5145' and sharename like '%c$' and accessmask = '0x2') and  not subjectusername like '%$')
